snippet.title: Mr. Bommels Teacats Teaser
snippet.description:
Welcome to Mr. Bommel's Teacat Factory! Where we create the world-famous Teacats since 1898.

Every Teacat is unique: perfectly designed for the preparation of one type of tea and in absolute harmony with the personality of its owner.

You've always dreamed of having your own Teacat, but never knew how to get one? Well, here's the chance of a lifetime: Mr. Bommel's Teacats Deluxe Package*!

Visit the honorable halls of Mr. Bommel's Teacat Factory and experience the manufacturing process of the magical Teacats first hand. Our experts will create the perfect Teacat** just for you!

* Limited offer: This package includes a guided tour and the manufacturing of a personalized Teacat. It is strictly not transferable.

** Liability claims against Mr. Bommel's Teacat Factory, which refer to damages of material or immaterial nature caused by use or failure to use the tea cat or by the statement of faulty and incomplete information during the process of creation, are generally excluded unless there is evidence of willful misconduct or gross negligence on Mr. Bommel's Teacat Factory's part.

Play the game: https://pitifeur.itch.io/mr-bommels-teacats

---

Music from Uppbeat (free for Creators!):
https://uppbeat.io/t/jonny-boyle/funny-in-france
License code: MKPZDI5MFSGLEUZI
